data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Amajyaruguru to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amajyaruguru, Rwanda
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Amajyaruguru, Rwanda to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 453,289 believers in Amajyaruguru that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Amajyaruguru a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Musanze
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Musanze, Amajyaruguru, Rwanda.
Father, bring yourself glory in Amajyaruguru. Through your servants plant 345 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Amajyaruguru, Rwanda a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Amajyaruguru, Rwanda has a population of 1,726,400.

We estimate Amajyaruguru has 453,289 people who might know Jesus, 1,083,815 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 189,296 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 453,289 believers in Amajyaruguru, Rwanda how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
